name: Tourist Bus Simulator 2016
description:
Are yo big time fan of bus simulator games?
If your answer is 'yes', Tourist Bus Simulator 2016 is a new simulation game for all who want to become a real bus driver and drive in environments like hill and jungle. This games environment will give you feel of driving in hillstation and african jungle.

Features of Bus Simulator game:

- full 3D environments with hill and jungle environment.
- many levels to complete
- select different bus and vehicles.
- easy controls and mutiple view


Download one of the best 2016 simulator bus games for free on google play and enjoy bus driving.
hope you will enjoy our new game and rate us.
